metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17580 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer over-read exists in the function fast_edit_packet() in the file send_packets.c of Tcpreplay v4.3.0 beta1. This can lead to Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially Information Exposure when the application attempts to process a crafted pcap file.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
